body:
so the 3 main issues are:

1. whilst uploading a file the web browser shows no files, it then has to be refreshed lots to make them appear.
2. it tries to re-sync all files randomly, asking if i wish to "remove all files" or "keep files".
3. it randomly deletes files, e.g. i had 5 files in the client folder when the above client log was createad:

draytek-vigor-2820-user-guide.pdf 
150813.txt
engine rebuild.docx
financial workings 300713.xlsx
new text document.txt

as soon as i started the owncloud sync client it checked the files and then deleted draytek-vigor-2820-user-guide.pdf  from the folder and server.

kind regards,
boseley

@schiesbn

please try to disable the advanced search - looks like it has issues running on windows.та

@butonic
@deepdiver1975 is this "full text search"? as i can not see an advanced search app in the apps list. thanks for replying.

@deepdiver1975 @butonic i am unsure if i disabled the correct app but i have disabled "full text search", i have then added a new file entitled "150813v2.txt" to the sync folder.

so i had 4 original files plus a new one:

engine rebuild.docx
financial workings 300713.xlsx
new text document.txt
150813.txt
150813v2.txt (new)
